original_text: And when they had been there many days, Festus declared Paul's cause unto the king, saying, There is a certain man left in bonds by Felix:
korean_text: 여러 날을 있더니 베스도가 바울의 일로 왕에게 고하여 이르되 벨릭스가 한 사람을 구류하여 두었는데

sentences.original_text: And when they had been there many days
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 거기 여러 날 있었을 때

sentences.original_text: Festus declared Paul's cause unto the king
There is a certain man left in bonds by Felix
sentences.korean_translation: 펠릭스에게 묶인 채 남겨진 어떤 사람이 있다
